Professional_Website.title: Personal Portfolio Website
Professional_Website.description: Full-stack portfolio built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features comprehensive SEO optimization, admin panel, dynamic GitHub integration, contact system, and responsive design. Showcases modern web development practices.

ComedyMovieDataAnalysis.title: Comedy Movie Data Analysis
ComedyMovieDataAnalysis.description: Data analysis of production trends in comedy movies using Python and data visualization.

PhotoManager.title: Photo Manager
PhotoManager.description: A desktop photo management application similar to Picasa, built with Python.

NewsAggregator.title: News Aggregator
NewsAggregator.description: Intelligent news aggregation tool that collects and organizes articles by topic.

Unit_Converter.title: Unit Converter
Unit_Converter.description: A versatile unit conversion utility supporting multiple measurement types.
